title: The life and death of Sr. Thomas Moore, who was Lord Chancelor of England to King Henry the Eight
author: More, Cresacre, 1572-1649.
notes: By Cresacre More. Has been erroneously ascribed to his brother Thomas. Cf. DNB, v. 38, p. 448.
Place of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
